subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: There was some initial intrigue for Pineda’s start, and the Yankees turned Pineda’s gem into a win at Yankee Stadium, with Dellin Betances getting the final five outs for the save.
snippet: There was some initial intrigue for Pineda’s start, and the Yankees turned Pineda’s gem into a win at Yankee Stadium, with Dellin Betances getting the final five outs for the save.
